title: Stop blocking chat in champ select.

replies.body: i cant even send a message or see who commented.. why???
yeah this chat block thing is so annoying i've called my lane early and first, 4 times in a row only to see it didn't send cause i was blocked. I hope they remove it

Bump because lately I have been getting quite a bit of this due other players spam. How about you block the spammer and not the others or even better still replace normals with draft normals, hey what a thought, no more need to call lanes wow.

I here-by vow to alt-f4 if i get blocked from calling a lane in champ select.

Reasons:
1) I normally call sup or fill but have been asking for jg lately and haven't had the opportunity to play a different roll due to getting blocked in chat champ select. I think playing fill should earn you some points when it comes to the madness that is champ select!
2) I am strictly against insta-locking champs. I believe in calling your roll before selecting champ.
3) If someone joins after I've called my role I will always type it again so that they have vision of what roles have been called.

It should be the other way around, block people from insta-locking !!! not for calling a roll ?!!
Dat moment when u call before u join, banned from chat ...
This is the most frustrating thing!

Sometimes it doesn't get blocked for me, but instead follows through my speed typing in slow motion, while I sit staring, wanting to get the message through already before someone else steals my role (and they usually do. And there's nothing I can do to stop it at that point so that person ends up raging even if I say it 0.25 seconds late, and the usual thing to assume is that I posted before seeing them call, thinking I'm a troll who'll go to that lane anyway regardless of how much I say I'm taking another role instead)
Oh you missed your lane call? You can't call any other lanes now lol.
It is worse if you get blocked without actually typing anything
